name: Stealth Project
description:
Stealth Project is a virtual reality stealth and puzzle game. 

Avoid the robots, open the gates and escape from the futuristic prision where you are held captive.  Enjoy the inmersiveness and tension of a stealth game in VR!

The current version is 0.1, as this is a prototype of the game. More mechanics, levels and gameplay improvements and polish may come on the future.
